actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

official_title: Authorizing the House of Representatives to participate in State and local government transit programs pursuant to section 7905 of title 5, United States Code.

summary.text: Requires the House of Representatives to participate in State and local government transit programs to encourage House employees to use public transportation. Directs the Committee on House Oversight to issue appropriate regulations.

titles.title: Authorizing the House of Representatives to participate in State and local government transit programs pursuant to section 7905 of title 5, United States Code.
